headline: Lam Research (LRCX) Is the Future, Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published Jim Cramer Discussed These 12 Stocks & Wondered Whether He Should Melt Silver. Lam Research Corporation (NASDAQ:LRCX) is one of the stocks that Jim Cramer discussed. Lam Research Corporation (NASDAQ:LRCX) is an American semiconductor manufacturing equipment provider. Its shares have gained 156% over the past year and by 13% year-to-date. Stifel bumped […]

headline: Lam Research Targets AI Growth With CEA Leti Deal And Leadership Shift
summary: Lam Research (NasdaqGS:LRCX) has entered a new multi year collaboration with CEA Leti to work on advanced specialty technology devices for AI and high performance computing. The partnership focuses on MEMS, 3D imaging, RF solutions, photonics, and quantum optics, aiming to speed up materials and device development. Lam has promoted Sesha Varadarajan to Chief Operating Officer and appointed Anirudh Devgan, CEO of Cadence Design Systems, to its board of directors. Lam Research, a key...
